Task Checklist: Modular Transition, Vector Eviction, Error Boundaries
1. Complete Modular Transition (main.js window.X removal)
 Refactor 
app.js
 CRITICAL_DEPENDENCIES to use ES imports instead of window.X
 Add ES imports to 
app.js
 for all modules currently checked via window
 Remove window.X assignments from 
main.js
 (lines 139-187)
 Update any remaining window.X references in other consumer files
 Run unit tests to verify: npm run test:unit (271 tests pass)
2. Vector Store LRU/Cap-based Eviction
 Create 
js/storage/lru-cache.js
 with LRU eviction policy
 Integrate LRU cache into 
local-vector-store.js
 Add configurable max vectors cap (default: 5000 vectors)
 Add 
getStats()
 enhancement to report eviction stats
 Create 
tests/unit/lru-cache.test.js
 for eviction logic
 Run tests: npm run test:unit
3. Error Boundaries for UI Widgets
Create js/services/error-boundary.js with vanilla JS error boundary pattern
 Wrap Chat widget with error boundary
 Wrap Card generator with error boundary
 Add recovery UI (retry button, error message) per widget
 Create tests/unit/error-boundary.test.js
 Run tests: npm run test:unit
4. Final Verification
 Run full unit test suite: npm run test:unit
 Run E2E tests: npm test
 Update AGENT_CONTEXT.md with new modules finish this task, some of it should be done, verify those steps, use the pal MCP server for anything you need help with

/**
 * Profile Sharing Service
 * 
 * Handles encrypted export/import of music listening profiles for collaborative analysis.
 * Uses AES-GCM encryption with a user-provided passphrase for privacy.
 * 
 * Privacy Model:
 * 1. User exports their profile with a passphrase
 * 2. Profile is encrypted client-side using AES-256-GCM
 * 3. Encrypted JSON can be shared via any channel (email, message, etc.)
 * 4. Recipient imports and decrypts with the same passphrase
 * 5. No server involved - fully client-side E2EE
 * 
 * HNW Considerations:
 * - Hierarchy: Clear authority over own profile data
 * - Network: Decoupled from storage layer, uses DataProvider
 * - Wave: Async encryption/decryption with progress
 * 
 * @module services/profile-sharing
 */
